QuestData.Title: At All Costs
QuestData.Description: We are to begin the ritual immediately, and you are to see to it that we are not interrupted.$B$BSlaughter any Kvaldir that enter the temple. See to it that my priestesses live to see their task complete, no matter the cost.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 20 Kvaldir attackers within Quel'Dormir Temple.$B$BThis task is part of a Naz'jar Battlemaiden vision. If needed, use the Blade of the Naz'jar Battlemaiden at a time focus to return to the vision.
QuestData.CompletionText: I am trusting you to safeguard us, Battlemaiden.
QuestData.RewardText: Azjentus is to be taken at his word. Lady Naz'jar's Honor Guard should be sufficient to see the rest of the ritual through.
